channel.title: Hugo on lifeofdan
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on lifeofdan

item.title: Hugo Setup
item.author: contact@lifeofdan.me (Dan)
item.description: (Image linked from https://themes.gohugo.io/theme/hugo-now/) Well, it has been one day since I finished the installation of Hugo as my blogging back-end. Wow. It was a bit of a mess. I need to first say that now that everything is up and running, I really like it. Once set up, it makes a lot of sense in the way they have chosen to do things. However, it was a bear to get my head around the setup.
